description: Erection of hip to gable roof extension, rear dormer extension and installation of three rooflights to facilitate loft conversion.
decision_conditions: The proposed roof extension, by reason of its detailed design would be an excessive addition which overwhelms the scale and character of the original property and would represent an incongruous roof addition which would be out of character with the street scene. The proposal would therefore be contrary to Policies CS8 and DM10 of the Royal Borough of Kingston upon Thames LDF Core Strategy (Adopted April 2012), and the Residential Design SPD (Adopted July 2013).
Condition 5 - RBK Highways engineer has reviewed the information submitted and is satified this can now be discharged.
Please confirm description of proposed works "Subdivision of property and erection of  1no.semi detached x 2 bedroom dwelling to the side of existing dwelling."

Inspection:Site inspection carried out as a desktop exercise with information provided by the applicant as supporting material to application.Assessment:Acceptable minor works to reduce and maintain trees at their current size in relation to the property with no adverse impact upon tree health or public amenity.Recommendation:No objections.
